description:
Azuma tells Kanazawa that he will withdraw from the concourse because he`s going to study in England causing this rumor to spread in the music department. Azuma then confronts Kahoko about this - as she too has been considering dropping out - disappointing Kazuki who is dismayed upon hearing this.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 失くした心のパヴァーヌ
